pages.name: Entry Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/rider_core_ids#gya_go_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Gya-Go Core ID$(/l)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Gya-Go
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zukan (2019, website)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gya_go)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed

pages.name: Fantasy Form
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#fantasy_raise_buckle)Fantasy Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Gya-Go
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gya_go)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed$(br2)Fantasy Buckle Effects:$(li)Slash II$(li)Strength II (with weapon)$(li)Resistance II$(li)Mirror II

pages.name: Armed Shield
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:geats/items/raise_buckles#shield_raise_buckle)Shield Buckle$(/l) (use in your off-hand to switch sides)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Gya-Go
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats: Final Stage (2023, stage show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_gya_go)Desire Driver$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Desire Driver user apart from $(l:geats/riders/xgeats)XGeats$(/l) and $(l:geats/riders/dooms_geats)Dooms Geats$(/l)$(br2)Core ID Effects:$(li)Speed$(br2)Shield Buckle Effects:$(li)Resistance
